Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and an open back pocket. Legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a shirt and sweater vest in cotton. Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.

Set with a shirt and sweater vest in cotton. Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a detachable bow tie with a plastic fastener. V-neck sweater vest in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Jeans in supersoft, washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with straight-cut hems.

Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric. Tight fit. The tops are made partly from recycled polyester.
Short, fitted dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with a drawstring at one side. Long sleeves and an asymmetric hem.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.

Calf-length circular skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and high slit at the front. Unlined.

Bikini top with underwired, lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.

Short, fitted dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with off-centre buttons, long sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in an airy crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with off-centre buttons, long sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar with a concealed hood that has an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Lined.

Short, lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar with a concealed hood that has an elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, welt side pockets and a zipped inner pocket. Lined.

Round sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces and lenses. The lenses are UV-protective, tinted and polarised. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.

Round sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces and lenses. The lenses are UV-protective, tinted and polarised. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with press-studs down the front, closed waterproof seams and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a peak. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with press-studs down the front, closed waterproof seams and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a peak. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jacket in a cotton weave with a flounce at the front. Detachable, lined hood, small stand-up collar, zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in a cotton weave with a zip down the front and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Fake welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Skirt in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems. Embroidery at the front and on one back pocket.
Short dungaree dress in cotton corduroy with a zip and concealed button at one side, adjustable straps with metal fasteners, a chest pocket and decorative front pockets.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a smooth finish at the waist and around the legs with folded seams. Wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut top in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck and asymmetric butterfly sleeves.
Fabric laptop case with a chunky zip, one outer compartment and two inner compartments in big hole mesh. Size 1x24x33 cm. Fits laptops up to 13”.
Short, off-the-shoulder, fitted dress in a smocked viscose weave with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and a frill trim at the top and hem.

Short dress in chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small frilled collar. V-neck opening with ties at the front, a gathered yoke at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a frill trim at the hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small frilled collar. V-neck opening with ties at the front, a gathered yoke at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a frill trim at the hem. Jersey lining.

Short dress in chiffon with broderie anglaise and a small frilled collar. V-neck opening with ties at the front, a gathered yoke at the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a frill trim at the hem. Jersey lining.

Coat in a jacquard-weave cotton blend containing some linen with an embroidered pattern front and back and long fringing at the hem. Side pockets, ties at the front and extra-long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Calf-length, V-neck kaftan woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a slight sheen. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a seam with a double drawstring at the waist. Concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Shorts in a crinkled weave with a high paper bag waist and side pockets.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides.

Wide pull-on trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave. Regular waist with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt at the front and elastication at the back, and side pockets.
